title: @Google pixel 2 microphone not working. No warranty service in India. Customers are getting cheated!
content: Pixel 2 microphone not working. Only 9 months used. Twice i have send for warranty service to B2x they simply return the phone mentioning there are scratches behind the phone. B2x is a fraud company i understand. Is there no Google pixel service in India!! I lost my 47000k purchasing this phone.
